name: Cheese Island (Ludum Dare #32) (GM48 #14)
description:
I got caught up in homework this time around, so I figured I'd just release what I had.

The main mechanic of the game involves eating parts of the terrain and being able to spit it back out. I originally had ideas for puzzles, enemies, different types of cheese, etc.

Use W to hop, A or D to move left or right, the mouse to aim, and left-click to eat/spit out cheese. There are also Xbox 360 gamepad controls involving the two sticks and the right shoulder button.
